history.proof: intros. induction n. - simpl. unfold Included. intros x Hx. inversion Hx. sfirstorder depth: 3. - simpl. unfold Included. intros x Hx. sfirstorder unfold: traces_app, In, Included.

exceptions.tactic: intros state d1 d2 n Hincluded tr Hincluded'.
intros state' d1 d2 n Hincluded tr Hincluded'.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.
Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.
Not an inductive goal with 1 constructor.

In environment state : Type d1, d2 : traces state n : nat H : Included (trace state) d1 d2 IHn : Included (trace state) (traces_power d1 n) (traces_power d2 n) x, tr1 : trace state Hd1 : traces_power d1 n tr1 Hd2 : end_state tr1 NonTerminating \\/ end_state tr1 Error Hx : x = tr1 Unable to unify "Included (trace state) (traces_power d1 n) (traces_power d2 n)" with "In (trace state) (traces_app (traces_power d2 n) d2) x".

original: intros state d1 d2 n Hincluded tr Hincluded'. induction n. - simpl. unfold Included in Hincluded'. unfold Included. intros x Hx. inversion Hx. - simpl. unfold Included in Hincluded', IHn. unfold Included. intros x Hx. destruct Hx as [tr1 [tr2 [Hd1 [Hd2 Hx]]] | [tr1 [Hd1 [Hd2 Hx]]]]. + exists tr1, tr2. split. apply IHn. apply Hincluded'. auto. auto. + exists tr1. split. apply IHn. apply Hincluded'. auto. left. auto.
